Atkins is looking for a Senior ID Architect for Site Supervision team in Umluj, KSA for large Hospitality developments.Experience in Five star hotel or Water villas required.Minimum Requirements:Bachelor of Science degree in Engineering or equivalent.Minimum of 15 years of relevant experience Construction industry with comprehensive experience in Interior Architecture.Reviewing of  drawing and calculation  interior fit-out & joinery shop drawings submitted by Sub-consultants and shop drawings submitted by contractors and issue OCS (Observation and Comments) review report and recommendations.Responsible for all Joinery, final finishes& fit-out site inspectionReviewing of the technical material submittals and RFIs from the contractors and provide responses.Attending technical meeting with contractors and sub-consultants and do the necessary coordination as required.Provide technical assistance to project managers and make coordination and technical consultation with other disciplines as required. Project hand over inspection at site and prepare report accordingly.Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Excellent technical, team-working and interpersonal skills.SNC Lavalin's Atkins business is one of the largest multidisciplinary, multi sector engineering design consultancies in the world and is part of the SNC Lavalin Group.As one of the world’s most respected design, engineering and project management consultancies with a leading track record in the defence sector, Atkins are ideally placed to respond to this market. We have a broad establishment and proud, 50 year history throughout the Middle East region.
We provide a full range of design, engineering and project management services for buildings, transportation and other infrastructure programmes.
